eemeli .sumPrecise _minimizes_ binary-floating-point errors, but still does binary math
content.formatted_body: eemeli .sumPrecise minimizes binary-floating-point errors, but still does binary math

content.body: i.e. `Math.sumPrecise(0.1, 0.2)` is the same as `0.1 + 0.2`, and not `0.3`
content.formatted_body: i.e. Math.sumPrecise(0.1, 0.2) is the same as 0.1 + 0.2, and not 0.3

content.body: * eemeli .sumPrecise _minimizes_ binary-floating-point errors by adding them in the optimal order, but still does binary math
content.formatted_body: * eemeli .sumPrecise minimizes binary-floating-point errors by adding them in the optimal order, but still does binary math
